feed.title: Melanated Mic Night
feed.subtitle: Twitter posts from Melanated Mic Night

entry.title: We take care of our own, and we collect our own. We do not harbor abusers, be they physical or emotional, and we do not harbor manipulators. “Fuck around and find out” applies to those who think they can get away with such behavior in our networks, too, to be clear.
entry.content: We take care of our own, and we collect our own. We do not harbor abusers, be they physical or emotional, and we do not harbor manipulators. “Fuck around and find out” applies to those who think they can get away with such behavior in our networks, too, to be clear.

entry.title: A Black man was trying to support an unhoused neighbor in a wheel chair and @DenverPolice knocked his glasses off, ripped his shirt off and two officers kneeled on his back. pic.twitter.com/AEvVeVxf7c
entry.content: A Black man was trying to support an unhoused neighbor in a wheel chair and @DenverPolice knocked his glasses off, ripped his shirt off and two officers kneeled on his back. pic.twitter.com/AEvVeVxf7c

entry.title: FACTS twitter.com/vinniechant/st…
entry.content: FACTS twitter.com/vinniechant/st…

entry.title: Wow. Just wow. What a powerful night full of empowering speeches. Thank you to all of our Black relatives who spoke tonight. Thank you to @TayAndersonCO and @CandiCdeBacaD9 for spitting facts and truths. Back to organizing we go— this is only the beginning. #melanatedmicnight pic.twitter.com/tY9SebWLCa
entry.content: Wow. Just wow. What a powerful night full of empowering speeches. Thank you to all of our Black relatives who spoke tonight. Thank you to @TayAndersonCO and @CandiCdeBacaD9 for spitting facts and truths. Back to organizing we go— this is only the beginning. #melanatedmicnight pic.twitter.com/tY9SebWLCa

entry.title: Tonight I was again reminded of the burden and work Black women carry in this movement. There are so many who are not heard in the community.
entry.content: Tonight I was again reminded of the burden and work Black women carry in this movement. There are so many who are not heard in the community.

entry.title:
White people: HoW dO wE kNoW hOw To HeLp?
Also white people: not showing up for actions with BIPOC speakers.
entry.content: White people: HoW dO wE kNoW hOw To HeLp? Also white people: not showing up for actions with BIPOC speakers.

entry.title: Extremists are planing to disrupt today’s non-violent action for Black lives. — We will rely on allies to help keep impacted folks centered on tonight’s message.
entry.content: Extremists are planing to disrupt today’s non-violent action for Black lives. — We will rely on allies to help keep impacted folks centered on tonight’s message.

entry.title: If you’re showing up to #melanatedmicnight & are a non-Black melanated human, we hope that you will understand that tonight’s mic night will be dedicated to our Black relatives— please help us uplift & amplify their voices tonight by taking the backseat with our white allies.
entry.content: If you’re showing up to #melanatedmicnight & are a non-Black melanated human, we hope that you will understand that tonight’s mic night will be dedicated to our Black relatives— please help us uplift & amplify their voices tonight by taking the backseat with our white allies.

entry.content: Of course twitter.com/melanatedmic/s…

entry.title: Let’s not forget about Trayford Pellerin — a 31 year old Black man who was murdered by the police in Lafayette, LA. He was shot 11 times on the evening of August 21, 2020. @TayAndersonCO can we include him in tonight’s prayers as well? #DenverProtest #denverprotests
entry.content: Let’s not forget about Trayford Pellerin — a 31 year old Black man who was murdered by the police in Lafayette, LA. He was shot 11 times on the evening of August 21, 2020. @TayAndersonCO can we include him in tonight’s prayers as well? #DenverProtest #denverprotests

entry.title: Being a police officer is the only occupation where you can shoot someone and get PAID TIME OFF. #BlackLivesMatter
entry.content: Being a police officer is the only occupation where you can shoot someone and get PAID TIME OFF. #BlackLivesMatter

entry.title: Update!! Jacob Blake is still alive and fighting for his life rn.
entry.content: Update!! Jacob Blake is still alive and fighting for his life rn.

entry.title: In observance of @TayAndersonCO event tonight at Manual HS for Jacob Blake, we have decided to move #melanatedmicnight to Fuller Park at 7:30 pm. Please join us at 6:30 pm at Manual HS in solidarity and prayer for the murder of Jacob Blake. #denverprotests #denverprotest pic.twitter.com/cvKeXK7zLk
entry.content: In observance of @TayAndersonCO event tonight at Manual HS for Jacob Blake, we have decided to move #melanatedmicnight to Fuller Park at 7:30 pm. Please join us at 6:30 pm at Manual HS in solidarity and prayer for the murder of Jacob Blake. #denverprotests #denverprotest pic.twitter.com/cvKeXK7zLk

entry.title: A black person shouldn’t have to be perfect or extraordinary or a college grad or a parent in order to explain why they deserved to not be shot by a police officer. This is a simple concept.
entry.content: A black person shouldn’t have to be perfect or extraordinary or a college grad or a parent in order to explain why they deserved to not be shot by a police officer. This is a simple concept.

entry.title: I am not okay with folks continuing to share the video of #JacobBlake being senselessly shot.
entry.content: I am not okay with folks continuing to share the video of #JacobBlake being senselessly shot.

entry.title: Here’s something y’all can read today— Misogynoir and how it affects Black womxn. Thank you @DrAprylA for sharing the tools to learn this! 💅🏽💅🏾💅🏿 twitter.com/drapryla/statu…

entry.title: Be kind, show some respect, understanding, and empathy for Black womxn. @DrAprylA is a wise and experienced womxn, who’s capable of holding herself accountable. Y’all should learn from her. twitter.com/kyoshilovespho…
entry.content: Be kind, show some respect, understanding, and empathy for Black womxn. @DrAprylA is a wise and experienced womxn, who’s capable of holding herself accountable. Y’all should learn from her. twitter.com/kyoshilovespho…

entry.title: @DrAprylA @melanatedmic “The most disrespected woman in America is the Black woman. The most unprotected person in America is the Black woman. The most neglected person in America is the Black woman.” — Malcom X (for all you radicals out there, learn from another radical like Malcom X).
entry.content: @DrAprylA @melanatedmic “The most disrespected woman in America is the Black woman. The most unprotected person in America is the Black woman. The most neglected person in America is the Black woman.” — Malcom X (for all you radicals out there, learn from another radical like Malcom X).

entry.title: Missionaries have been one of the most effective instruments of colonisation. They have been used as a tool to control & subjugate indigenous people. By imposing their religion & the superiority of their god, they set in motion the domination & exploitation we still see today.
entry.content: Missionaries have been one of the most effective instruments of colonisation. They have been used as a tool to control & subjugate indigenous people. By imposing their religion & the superiority of their god, they set in motion the domination & exploitation we still see today.

entry.title: We have decided to take our next #melanatedmicnight to the community! Yt allies welcomed to support Melanated voices. 😊 pic.twitter.com/GfwKuVKDhe
